name: Setup
description:
# SETUP
\On Runelite, click on the cog to edit the plugin.
\Under the 'general' category, switch font mode from 'runelite' to 'plugin.' Under 'Display settings', turn on 'Menu: deprioritize hidden items.' Under the 'Item Value Rules' category, untick insane, high, medium, and low tier boxes. Optional: turn on 'Highlight notification'
